    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière sur des miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflection on mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion auf Spiegeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara em espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara sugli specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση στους καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera en los espejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre que les miroirs réfléchissent la lumière dans une direction seulement et suivant le même angle que lorqu'elle  frappe sa surface. Ceci peut être utilisé pour un exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration that mirrors reflect light only in one direction and at the same angle as it strikes its surface. This may be used for a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">direction</string>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">faisceaux lumineux</string>
            <string language="en">light beams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons  légers</string>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion légère</string>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">surfaces  brillantes</string>
            <string language="en">shiny surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung, der Spiegel Licht nur in einer 
Richtung und im gleichen Winkel reflektieren, dem sie seine 
Oberfläche anschlägt. Dieses kann für eine beschriftende 
Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração que os espelhos refletem a luz 
somente em um sentido e no mesmo ângulo que golpeia sua superfície. 
Isto pode ser usado para um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione che gli specchi riflettono 
la luce soltanto in un senso ed allo stesso angolo come colpisce la 
relativa superficie. Ciò può essere usata per un'esercitazione
identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση ότι οι καθρέφτες απεικονίζουν το 
φως μόνο σε μια κατεύθυνση και στην ίδια γωνία όπως χτυπά την 
επιφάνειά του. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για μια 
άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración que los espejos reflejan la luz
solamente en una dirección y al mismo ángulo que pulso su 
superficie. Esto se puede utilizar para un ejercicio de 
etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtstrahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
